component.name: iCloud Services
component.summary: Access iCloud web services on Linux

description.p: iCloud Services provides native desktop integration for Apple's iCloud web services. Each service launches in a dedicated browser window in app mode (no address bar) for a clean, native-like experience. You can use your password or sign in with a passkey to use your iPhone's Face ID.

ul.li: Individual launchers for Mail, Contacts, Calendar, Photos, Drive, Notes, Reminders, Pages, Numbers, Keynote, and Find My
Clean app-like interface with no browser UI elements
Each service has its own dock icon and persistent login
Native desktop integration with proper icons and application categories

description.p: Note: This is an unofficial third-party application not affiliated with Apple Inc. iCloud is a trademark of Apple Inc. Icons by The Cross-Platform Organization (https://github.com/cross-platform) under GNU GPL v3.
